document_data.name: Groshin Lor
document_data.home: [[Mulmaster]], [[Moonsea]]{{Cite adventurers league/Mayhem in the Earthspur Mines|6-7}}
document_data.mainbody: 'Groshin Lor''' ({{Pronounce|GRO|shin|_|Lor|refs={{Cite adventurers league/Mayhem in the Earthspur Mines|36}}}}) was the leader of the [[Hawks]] secret police in [[Mulmaster]] in [[1491 DR]].
